text:
Family Sharing is designed to share benefits while protecting individual privacy, and no personal content is shared by default without explicit user
action.
Sent:03/11/2024 at 03:02 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/11/2024 at 03:11 PM)
Subject:Re: Apple Family Plan
Message 2115 of 4024
Did we want to touch base today on next steps civilly? It can all come through four degrees of separation but it’s going to cost us a fortune and be less
effective.
V -> Annalisa -> Lisa -> robert
I really hope for the kids and our sake we can rein this in. No one would believe what we have come to. We were so good together it’s just impossible
to think of.
I assure you I will respond in kind and be kind and respectful. If we can give each other credit for having our own perspective and look forward, not
back as Dr Brown asked, it’ll make all the difference in the world.
Please let me know, Christine and I will respect your wishes.
Sent:03/11/2024 at 04:05 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/11/2024 at 04:10 PM)
Subject:Re: $$$ Today $$$

metadata.section: 5. **Emails and Messages**: Family members cannot access each other’s emails, messages, or call history ever.
